content_parts.title: Sales invoice and credit note lines report

content_parts.content: On the Sales invoice line page, you can display a list of sales invoice and credit note lines with detailed information. You can also export this list to an Excel or CSV file.

From the Purchase order line inquiry page, you can display the list of purchase order lines according to selected criteria. 
This page also displays the total number of selected purchase order lines and purchase orders, as well as the total ordered amount and total remaining amount.
You can export the result as an Excel or CSV file.

From the Sales order line inquiry page, you can display the list of sales order lines according to selected criteria. 
This page also displays the total number of selected sales order lines and sales orders, as well as the total ordered amount and total remaining amount.
You can export the result as an Excel or CSV file.
You can print a sales shipment pick list report from the Sales shipment page for sales shipments that are not shipped yet.
You can print a sales order confirmation as a PDF from the Sales order page.

content_parts.content:
You can add free-format instructions and links to supporting documentation for individual components in a bill of material and production operations in a routing. The instructions are included when the bill of material or routing is added to a new work order.
Note that existing work orders are not updated if the instructions are edited or deleted in the bill of material or routing.
You can print a pick list from the work order listing the components needed for production.

Closing a completed work order on the work order page will now reflect the work-in-progress costs in your accounting documents. 

When you close a work order, the work-in-progress cost variances generate the related journal entries. This includes all operating costs such as production, material, setup time and runtime tracking. You can define different accounts for each movement in a dedicated work-in-progress journal entry type.
